RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 93. Claiming Purse 18100. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 27 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 27 All owed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000, if for $14,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOWNTOWNCHALYBROWN pressed the early pace three wide, made a two wide bid on the turn to take over, then drew off in the stretch to prove much the best under a mild drive. JUMPMASTER tracked the pace four wide, made a three wide bid on the turn, but could not go with the winner in the drive while staying on to be clearly second best. A T M AWESOME was allowed to settle early, inside on the turn and came three wide into the lane, angled out in mid stretch and was along for the show award. ECLIPTICALS ELLIOT was well placed on the inside, angled out in the stretch but was empty. ZIGGY MON set a pressured pace on the inside and was headed on the turn and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Eclipticals Elliot
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, saved ground turn, angled out, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Ziggy Mon
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, headed turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: A T M Awesome
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside turn, came 3 wide, angled out, got 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Jumpmaster
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 4 wide, bid 3 wide, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Downtownchalybrown
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, bid 2 wide, drew off stretch, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 15500. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGNETIC CHARM was well rated four wide early, made a three wide move on the turn and took over nearing the quarter pole, then drew off to prove much the best, driving. BROBRO CORMAN set the early pace while clear, then was headed nearing the quarter pole and proved to be no match for the winner, second best. BUFF AND SHINE was allowed to settle early, made a middle move up the inside nearing the half mile marker, weakened on the turn and bested rest. BRANTLEYS BIG GUN was reserved early, three wide on the turn and lacked a rally. RIVERBOAT BANDIT was off slowly and had no speed, not a factor. RED DEVOLUTION had an awkward break, then chased the pace two wide and tired after a half mile.

ENTRY.NAME: Red Devolution
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkwardly, chased 2 wide, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Brobro Corman
ENTRY.COMMENT: set unchallenged pace inside, headed turn, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Brantleys Big Gun
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 3 wide turn, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Riverboat Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, void early speed, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Buff and Shine
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, middle move inside, weakened, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Magnetic Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated 4 wide, 3 wide move turn, drew off, ridden out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANOTHERWORLDINSIDE set a pressured pace on the inside and made a bid leaving the turn to draw clear to prove best, driving. THEFABULOUS MOOLAH pressed the early pace four wide, made a three wide bid on the turn but could not keep up with the winner in the drive, second best. BUSTIN WIDE OPEN was close up early in between rivals, then shifted out entering the turn and chased the pace three wide, then held the show award late. UNCAPTURED GRACE was reserved early on the inside, then came three wide into the lane, was in traffic by the furlong marker and angled out to have a belated rally. MISS REMMIA tracked the early pace three wide, four wide on the turn and came five wide into the lane and weakened. SHELLEY'S SONG was allowed to settle early, made a inside run on the turn and then lacked a late rally.

ENTRY.NAME: Anotherworldinside
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, bid upper stretch, drew clear, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Uncaptured Grace
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, came 3 wide, traffic 1/8, angled out, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Bustin Wide Open
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up between horses, 3 wide turn, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Remmia
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 3 wide, 4 wide turn, came 5 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Shelley's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Thefabulous Moolah
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 4 wide, bid 3 wide, no match, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 16400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since February 27 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Pr ice $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHAT SAY YOU set the pace on the inside and was well rated on the front end, drew out on the turn and then was ridden out to prove best. ONCE A GIANT was allowed to settle early, came four wide into the lane and closed with good energy late to be clearly second best. FACTOTUM tracked the winner three wide and then weakened on the turn, bested rest. HOLD THE IRISH tracked the pace along the inside and was ridden along on the turn to keep up but weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Hold the Irish
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, ridden along turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: What Say You
ENTRY.OWNER: Bedlam Star Extra Farm LLC and Hackerman Richard J
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, well handled, drew clear turn, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Factotum
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 3 wide, weakened, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Once a Giant
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, came 4 wide upper stretch, closed well

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FINISHING TOUCH tracked the early pace four wide, made a three wide bid and split rivals by the quarter pole, then was clear by the furlong marker and edged away to prove best, driving. TELL ME IM AWESOME chased the pace two wide, then made a bid on the turn and was in tight by the quarter pole, then made a inside bid leaving the turn and ran on but could not get to the winner, second best. HI HEELED WARRIOR was bumped at the start, stalked the early pace three wide, then drifted out a tad on the turn and was four wide by the quarter pole, came five wide into the lane and faded, got show award late. TRAJEC HOLIDAY prompted the early pace and made a two wide bid on the turn to gain a short lead, then faded in the drive, lost show award late. LITTLE MOOJI was away alertly to set the pace on the inside and was headed on the turn and weakened. CATALENA showed no early speed and lacked a rally. HOP TO A DECISION chased the pace on the inside and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Hop to a Decision
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Tell Me Im Awesome
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2 wide, in tight 1/4, bid inside, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Catalena
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Trajec Holiday
ENTRY.OWNER: Albright George R and Hughes Alfred A
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 2 wide, bid 2 wide, led 1/4, faded, lost 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Hi Heeled Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, stalked pace 3 wide, drifted out 1/4, faded,got 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Finishing Touch
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 4 wide, bid 3 wide, split 1/4, clear 1/8, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: Little Mooji
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO PA-RESTRICTED RACE(S) OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mi le Or Over Since March 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since February 27 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOFIA'S SECRET stalked the early pace and made a three wide bid on the turn and took over leaving the turn and edged clear to prove best, driving. PERFECT HIDEAWAY set a pressured pace on the inside and was headed leaving the turn and then stayed on gamely to be second best. ONE MORE KELLY pressed the pace two wide and was between rivals leaving the quarter pole and faded, lasted for the show award. EIGHT DANZAS tracked the pace on the inside and saved ground on the turn and lacked the needed stretch bid. SWAN POINT was allowed to settle early, two wide on the turn and swung out four wide leaving the turn and had no kick. MELODIA chased the early pace and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Eight Danzas
ENTRY.OWNER: Paladin of PA and Fox Tale Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, saved ground, needed stretch bid

ENTRY.NAME: Melodia
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Swan Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 2 wide turn, swung out 4 wide, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Sofia's Secret
ENTRY.OWNER: BTR Racing Inc and Pruet Jr Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, edged clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Hideaway
ENTRY.OWNER: McClay Thomas G Sweigart Dennis and Cullari Salvatore
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, headed upper, kept on, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: One More Kelly
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, between 1/4, faded, held 3rd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 10000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 27. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GLOSSY MADRINA stalked the early pace three wide, then made a four wide bid to vie for command four wide by the quarter pole, then edged clear in the furlong grounds. ROSES FROM HEAVEN broke outwardly at the start, vied for the early lead three wide, then was between rivals by the quarter pole, dueled for command by the furlong marker but could not go with the winner late, second best. GIMME'S GOLDENGIRL was rated early on the inside, eased out on the turn and was four wide by the quarter pole, came five wide into the lane and was along for the show award. ONE TOUGH ROSE chased the early pace, came four wide into the drive but had no kick, missed show award. LUSCIOUS LOLA was away alertly to vie for the lead on the inside, shuffled back on the turn and faded. SUSIKIN hopped at the start, then rushed up to vie for command between rivals, then dropped to the inside on the turn while being inside of a trio, then weakened in the lane. PER RULING FROM THE PENNSYLVANIA RACING COMMISSION, ONE TOUGH ROSE WAS DISQUALIFIED FOR POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: Gimme's Goldengirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, eased out turn, came 5 wide, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: dq-One Tough Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, came 4 wide upper stretch, no kick, missed 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Susikin
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, vied between horses, inside turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Glossy Madrina
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 4 wide, vied 1/4, edged clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Luscious Lola
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, vied inside, shuffled back, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Roses From Heaven
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outwardly, vied 3 wide, between horses turn, 2nd best
